justification: "Artificial choice tasks in relation to real-world resources … The dilemmas are typically expressed as choices between lotteries … In some studies the lotteries are paid out; in others, hypothetical."

measured_by: computer-based foraging/choice tasks with risky vs. safe options
justification: Table 1 summarises laboratory studies (e.g., Mishra & Lalumière, 2010) where participants "chose between options that produce payoffs … differ in their level of risk," using computer tasks that require selecting a risky or safe alternative.

measured_by: self-report appraisal of ability to meet basic needs
justification: "Some studies used subjective rather than objective resources variables … they used the participants' appraisals of whether they had enough to meet their basic needs" (de Courson et al., 2025; Tucker, 2012).
